setAnalogStickControllingCursor(int) - Method in class de.ralleytn.simple.input.Gamepad
Sets which analog stick should control the mouse cursor.

Enables/Disables the ability to control the mouse cursor with an analog stick.

Sets the cursor position.

Sets the mouse cursor position.
setCursorSensity(float) - Method in class de.ralleytn.simple.input.Gamepad
Sets the sensity with which the cursor is moved.

setTimeBetweenUpdates(long) - Method in class de.ralleytn.simple.input.Device
Sets how long the thread will wait after an update.
startListening() - Method in class de.ralleytn.simple.input.Device
Starts the thread that listens to the input events of this device.
